name: NEODOGMA - Episode 1 - DEMO V1
description:
ROSE TIGER productions presents NEODOGMA, an EP inside a video game.

For most artists who were born in the early 90’s, video games are not only a hobby, but a real source of inspiration as powerful as books and movies. 

But despite its commercial success, the "10th art" is still quite underrated in the music business, and there are more interesting connections to be done between the two worlds.

Leader of the musical project ROSE TIGER , Wendy Killmann will release his second EP as a free DIY video game where the players will be involved in an epic quest to unlock the songs.

The game is 100% homemade by the artist with RPG Maker MV.

It is built into a 2D classic old school RPG format.

The players will embody Wendy, a pizza delivery guy in research of his past and his robot/best friend Marcus.

Full version will be released in January 2019.

Have a good game !

http://www.rosetiger.net
